reload.name: [%key:common::action::reload%]
reload.description: Reloads ping sensors from the YAML-configuration.

deprecated_platform_yaml.title: Ping YAML configuration has moved
deprecated_platform_yaml.description:
Configuring Ping `{platform}` using YAML has moved.

Consult the [documentation](https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/ping/) to move your YAML configuration to integration key and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
